definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
Titan (moon of Saturn), aka Saturn VI
Enceladus (moon of Saturn), aka Saturn II

sentences.english: Saturn's frigid moon Titan may be friendlier to life than previously thought.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的土衛泰坦可能比之前想象的更合適生命發展。

sentences.english: Why is this giant crater on Mimas oddly colored?
sentences.chinese: 土衛一上這個巨型環形山爲什麼有這麼古怪的顏色？

sentences.english: Saturn's F ring appears to be herded by Prometheus and Pandora.
sentences.chinese: 土星的F環似乎是由土衛十六與土衛十七看管。

sentences.english: Saturn's F ring appears to be herded by Prometheus and Pandora.
sentences.chinese: 土星的F環似乎是由土衛十六與土衛十七看管。
